page.title: 17O.A.P. Survey by Neil Flux.
page.content: We did a survey of old age pensioners in West Taphouse to find out what life is like for them. They like living in West Taphouse but the traffic is very noisy and some find it a little inconvenient for shoping etc. Half go to Liskeard for their main shoping,banking and medical services and half go to Lostwithiel. Most travel by car but some rely on Public Transport. If they are ill most rely on someone to call and help them. Hobbies enjoyed by the O.A.P. are gardening,pottering with car engines, dancing,darts,knitting,sewing,painting sightseeing,scrabble,chess,draughts and television. Things could be better for the O.A.P. by giving them more help,more pension and more clubs for getting together.
